Articles.Content: Last night, landed on Minmus. Loaded back in this morning, to the autosave, and the command module (Apollo-style mission) has changed direction on its own so its now on a suborbit and out of fuel when it had plenty before. Can not fix by reverting saves.

Correction;

Fuel showed empty and engines did not fire. Disabled/Enabled engines and pulsed throttle, fuel showed back up and engine did fire.
Seems to be a general issue with the orbits, I've noticed timewarp can drastically change orbit, and the AP and PE can fluctuate without you doing anything.
